[ library(fd_sbds) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

is_sbds_var(?Var)

checks whether a variable is an SBDS variable
Var
Variable to check

Description

Succeeds if and only if Var is a variable and has been initialised as an SBDS variable (through a call to sbds_initialise/4 or sbds_initialise/5).

Fail Conditions

Var is not a variable or not an SBDS variable.

See Also

sbds_initialise / 4, sbds_initialise / 5
